title: Most Efficient Fertilizer Usage
description: In 2022, New Zealand achieved a fertilizer consumption rate of 1633.43 kilograms per hectare of arable land, indicating efficient agricultural practices.

title: Lowest Interest Rate Spread
description: In 2018, New Zealand had a negative interest rate spread of -3.26%, reflecting a unique financial environment.

title: Top Public Services for Labor
description: By 2024, New Zealand scored a perfect 100 in the adequacy of public services for labor, showcasing exceptional support for its workforce.

title: Efficient Taxation System
description: In 2024, New Zealand's overall taxation score was 71.74, with a high quality of regulations rated at 75, reflecting a well-structured tax system.

title: Minimal Tax Official Meetings
description: In 2023, businesses in New Zealand required only one meeting with tax officials on average, indicating streamlined tax processes.

title: High Political Stability
description: In 2023, New Zealand had 9 sources confirming its political stability, with a low standard error of 0.205, indicating a stable and peaceful environment.

title: Minimal Tariff Lines with International Peaks
description: In 2022, only 0.017% of New Zealand's tariff lines for all products had international peaks, highlighting low trade barriers.

title: Low Tariff Lines for Primary Products
description: In 2022, New Zealand had just 0.128% of tariff lines with international peaks for primary products, promoting trade openness.
